PTR.description: Parametric Test Record - Includes HEAD_NUM and SITE_NUM for proper field mapping

MPR.description: Multiple-Result Parametric Record - Includes HEAD_NUM and SITE_NUM for proper field mapping

SBR.description: Software Bin Record - Dynamic addition demo

HBR.description: Hardware Bin Record - Auto-extract ALL fields with guaranteed HEAD_NUM, SITE_NUM, HBIN_NUM mapping

FTR.description: Functional Test Record - Auto-extract ALL fields with guaranteed TEST_NUM, HEAD_NUM, SITE_NUM mapping

usage_notes.auto_extract: To auto-extract ALL fields from a record type, set 'enabled': true and 'fields': [] (empty array)
usage_notes.required_fields: For auto-extract with guaranteed field mapping order, add 'required_fields': ['FIELD1', 'FIELD2'] - these fields will be mapped first in the specified order
usage_notes.specific_fields: To extract only specific fields, list them in the 'fields' array
usage_notes.discovery: Use the discover_available_fields() method to see all available fields for any record type
